body:
We scanned Gregs copy and the scan was posted on our pub site last  
year; you can download at http://btech.lbl.gov/pubs
then search grynberg


we have all of our pubs posted here- almost back to illustrated  
manuscripts or at least some done on typewriters
note you can search abstracts, titles, and/or authors
for example a search for the word "daylight" in abstracts will return  
156 documents you can review and download.


Steve
